mail_body:
Hi [Employee Name],

Hope you're having a great week!

Following up on our initial conversation, I'm thrilled to confirm your upcoming property viewing in London. We've lined up a fantastic selection of furnished apartments that I think you'll absolutely love. 

To recap, your viewing is scheduled for:

Date: 2024-07-18
Time: 10:00 AM
Agent: Sarah Miller

Sarah will meet you at the first property on the list and guide you through the rest. She's incredibly knowledgeable about the London rental market and can answer any questions you might have. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions before then.

We're really excited to help you find the perfect place in London!

Best regards,

[Relocation Agent Name]
[Relocation Company Name]
